pr_title: Move dependencies.json under the eng folder

timeline.bodyText: Does the relative paths to the pomUrls in the file also need to be updated?
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -117,7 +117,7 @@ jobs:
 
       - script: |
           git clone https://github.com/JonathanGiles/DependencyChecker.git
-          mkdir input && cp dependencies.json input/
+          mkdir input && cp eng/DependencyChecker/client_dependencies.json input/dependencies.json

replies.bodyText: The contents of the dependency file do not need to change, I just changed where it's being copied from. It's still going to be copied into the same location that dependency checker needs it to be.
replies.author: JimSuplizio

replies.bodyText: Now that we have the java - aggregate-reports pipeline, we should probably make this change there as client.yml is nearly 100% obsolete. Just need to look at moving a repo wide code coverage collection step across.
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText: @mitchdenny, I don't think you saw the second commit (which was in about 30 minutes before your comment). I'd changed it in both places and run the aggregate-reports pipeline to verify.
replies.author: JimSuplizio

timeline.message: change both places where this is used
